scripts.test:expose:
echo '// Generated file, do not edit!' > index.ts; find -iname '*.spec.ts' -not -wholename '*node_modules*' -exec node -p 'x = "{}";`import * as ${x.replace(/(\.\.?\/|\/)+|.spec.ts$/g,"")} from "${x.substr(0,x.length-3)}"
export { ${x.replace(/(\.\.?\/|\/)+|.spec.ts$/g,"")} }`' \; >> index.ts
